channel.title: Little Console Game
channel.description:
Made a little console game.. What do you think about it? I'm planning on adding: -drops (money) -a shop to buy weapons
Some pics: [IMG]http://i47.photobucket.com/albums/f168/nevercme/1-4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.photobucket.com/albums/f168/nevercme/2-2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.photobucket.com/albums/f168/nevercme/3-2.jpg[/img]

item.title: Little Console Game
item.dc:creator: @VbCoder VbCoder
item.description:
@VbCoder wrote:

Updated it a bit…

Now you can login/register
If you log in, the client sends your info to the server, server checks it and sends an answer back (correct/wrong password/wrong username)
If you logged in the server sends the client the info about NPC’s and stuff (no other files required at the client’s folder with info)
Also going to add an experience system to level up & fighting other players online

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Yeah but he can still use other languages
[/quote]

Example:
C/C++

Seeing as they’re the most popular languages across the internet. Like every window on your windows computer is from… C.
If your not on windows then obviously thats different but yes, they’re extremely popular. I wounder why? :o[/quote]
Huh?

item.title: Little Console Game
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:13, topic:384246”][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=480008.msg3517985#msg3517985 date=1299174172]

I hate VB. I used to think it was simple until I started coding rsps, then when I tried to do VB again, I was like “how do I declare shit again?”

Exactly, I’m more suited to using Braces now instead if End If, etc.
[/quote]
And Java even seems simpler now… Seems much shorter, cleaner and easier to read than VB imo.[/quote]

I use C# and Java, they’re very similar.

Read full topic
